Uses of Interface
com.warzone.elements.orders.Orders

Packages that use Orders
Package
Description
com.warzone.elements
Contains basic elements used in the game like countries, continents, map and player.
com.warzone.elements.orders
Contains all the orders which the user provides during game phase
com.warzone.strategy
Contains four types of strategy of player: Random, Cheater Aggressive, Benevolent and Human.

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Queue<Orders>
    Player.d_orders
    This Queue stores the object of type Orders for each Player to be executed in FIFO pattern later.

  • Uses of Orders in com.warzone.elements.orders

    Classes in com.warzone.elements.orders that implement Orders
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Advance
    This class represents the advance command.
    class 
    Airlift
    This class represents the airlift card.
    class 
    Blockade
    Whenever blockade card is used, triple the armies present in one of the country they control and in return looses control over that country, neutral player gets the control of the country.
    class 
    Bomb
    This class represents the bomb card which allows you to target an enemy or neutral territory and kill half of the armies on that territory.
    class 
    Deploy
    Deploy order class
    class 
    Diplomacy
    This class represents the diplomacy card.
    class 
    Dummy
    This class is dummy order class, in order to return something of Order type in command which does all the processing itself and not done by Orders object, then this class is used.
    class 
    Exit
    This is the exit class order, while in IssueOrder phase, if the player types exit to commit its command then, this class is used.

  • Uses of Orders in com.warzone.strategy

    Methods in com.warzone.strategy that return Orders
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Orders
    Aggressive.createOrder()
    This Method is used to create orders based on play of aggressive player.
    Orders
    Benevolent.createOrder()
    This method is used to create orders to deploy on its weakest country moves its armies in order to reinforce its weaker country
    Orders
    Cheater.createOrder()
    This method is used to implement logic of acquiring neighbouring countries and doubling armies for the Cheater Player.
    Orders
    HumanPlayer.createOrder()
    This method is used to create orders deploys on a country, attacks neighboring countries and moves armies between its countries plays cards according to its needs
    abstract Orders
    PlayerStrategy.createOrder()
    This method is implemented by strategy classes
    Orders
    RandomPlayer.createOrder()
    This method creates random orders, deploys on a random country attacks random neighboring countries moves armies randomly between its countries
